content.raw:
This is not ready for a merge, but I just want feedback if I am going in the right direction or not. \(I am not sure how else I can show you a diff between my branch and master, if there is a more appropriate way than making a PR, please tell me\)

* Firstly, am I going towards the right direction? \(creating a note and an `onCollisionMsg` function\)
* What should happen when a collision is detected? I am thinking I should just make a counter of how many times the wamv is hit so that may be used later for score calculation.
* Brian mentions in the issue “Plugin should include logic so that only one event is recorded per incident”. Right now I implement that using the timer. Is there a preferable way of doing this?
content.html:
This is not ready for a merge, but I just want feedback if I am going in the right direction or not. (I am not sure how else I can show you a diff between my branch and master, if there is a more appropriate way than making a PR, please tell me)

  • Firstly, am I going towards the right direction? (creating a note and an onCollisionMsg function)
  • What should happen when a collision is detected? I am thinking I should just make a counter of how many times the wamv is hit so that may be used later for score calculation.
  • Brian mentions in the issue “Plugin should include logic so that only one event is recorded per incident”. Right now I implement that using the timer. Is there a preferable way of doing this?
